title: Bechaini
description: Yaadon ki bechaini, dil ki pukaar, aur ek khumaar jo raat bhar saath ho.
content:
Kisi ki yaad mein beqarar raha main,
Har ek raat jaise khumar raha main.
Woh aaya bhi toh nazar pher ke guzar gaya,
Main dil hi dil mein pukarta raha main.

title: Shaam Ka Naam
description: Ek shaam ek naam likhunga, khwabon mein baat likhunga.
content:
Ek shaam ek naam likhunga,
Khud ko khaak tujhe chaand likhunga;
Jo kehna tha kabhi keh na saka,
Ab khwabon mein woh baat likhunga.

title: Woh Ek Pal
description: Ek pal ki chahat, ek bekarar nazar ki kahani.
content:
Woh ek pal ko aaya, nazar mila kar chala gaya,
Jaise meri chahat ka mazak bana kar chala gaya.
Tumhari nazar mein bas ek Bebas si kahani thi,
Aur main apni duniya luta kar chala gaya.

title: Kabhi Kabhi
description: Kabhi chaha, kabhi bhool diya, kabhi roshni, kabhi andhera.
content:
Kabhi shiddat se chaha mujhe
Kabhi be-rukhi sa bhula diya
Kabhi roshni ka sabab banaya
Kabhi andheron mein dubaa diya
Kabhi chaand keh ke sajaya mujhe
Kabhi be-kadar sa mita diya
